64496.「あっ <pc>さん。よかった。\n あなたのこと 探してたんだよ！:
Ah, <pc>! Thank goodness. We've
been looking all over for you!

64497.「あれから 私たち 元の世界に戻る方法を\n いろいろ 探してみたんだけど 全然:
We tried everything we could to find a way
back to our world, but... nothing worked.
I don't really get it...

64499.<pc>は ムーニス王から聞いた\nナシームの洞くつのことを セラフィに話した。:
<pc> told Seraphi about Naseem Cave,
which King Moonis mentioned.

64500.「なるほど…… ナシームの洞くつね……。\n そこって カレヴァンさんが\n 銀:
Naseem Cave, I see.... that's where
Kalevan's silver cameo was taken, right?

64501.「ふたつの世界にある ナシームの洞くつが\n つながってるんだとすると そこから:
If Naseem's Cave is connected in both of our
worlds, then maybe it's a chance to get back
to the other world...

64502.「カレヴァンさん！ 今度こそ\n 家族に会えるかもしれないよ！:
Maybe I'll finally be able to meet your
family, Kalevan!

64505.「<pc>さん。ナシームの洞くつの中には\n まだ秘密が あるかもしれないから:
There may be more secrets hiding inside of
Naseem Cave, so let's go have another look!
We'll meet you there!

64506.「<cs_pchero>さん。\n この辺り なんか あやしいニオイが\n プン: Something smells kinda fishy around here...

64508.「最後の仕上げは 我ら兄弟が\n チカラを合わせて 取りかからねば……。\n 今:
We must put the finishing touches on this
together, my brother... we must do it now!

64509.「え～ めんどくせーよー。\n だいたい 大魔王さまの作った 転移ゲートを\n:
Uggh... What a pain in the rear..
Why do WE have to fix up this transfer gate
the Demon Lord made?

64510.「今回の穴埋めは 魔元帥ゼルドラドさまの\n 特命によって 我ら兄弟に与えられた:
We were given this special task by none other
than the Demon Marshal Zeldrad himself!

64511.「後は 偽りのレンダーシアと\n 真のレンダーシアの行き来が可能な\n この転移:
All that's left to finish is to close
this gate! You know, the one that lets you
travel between true and false Lendersia?!

64512.「だから お前も チカラを貸すのだ！: That is why you must help me!

64513.「んー イマイチ やる気でねぇ。: Mmm... I don't really feel like it.

64514.「王様が言ってた ふたつの世界が\n つながってるって ホントだったんだ。\n:
So what the king said about the two worlds
being connected is true. I'm sure we can use
that to return to the real world.

64516.「ニャヒヒヒ！ 気づかれちゃった～♪\n いけないんだ～！ のぞき見なんかして～:
Nee hee hee! Look who I found!
Stop right there! You've already seen too
much!

64517.「にーちゃまたちー！ こんな所で\n 人間 発見したよーん♪ ニャヒヒヒヒ！:
Hey, you two! Look what I found! Some humans!
Nyee hee hee hee!

64518.「なにっ！？\n この転移ゲートは 間もなく封鎖するため\n 使用禁止だ！ ただ:
What?! This transfer gate is about to be
closed! It's forbidden from use! Leave here,
immediately!

64519.「転移ゲートを 閉じるなんて……\n そんなこと 絶対 させるもんですか！:
There's no way I'm gonna let you close that
gate!

64521.「なんだなんだ～ もめごとか～？\n 仕事をサボってた分 バトルでなら\n 穴埋:
What's this? You gotta problem? Guess I can
make up for being lazy by fightin' you guys!
Come on, let's go!

64522.「ニャヒ ニャヒヒヒヒッ♪ \n アンタの 最後の希望ってヤツ……\n アタシた:
Nee hee hee hee heeeee! If this really is
your last hope... then we'll make sure we're
the last thing you see!! ♪

64523.「我ら あなうめ３兄弟に 仇なす者よ。\n なんじを 墓穴に 埋めてくれよう！！:
You who would cross us, the Hole-y
Three... We will dig your graves here!

64525.「このままじゃ 転移ゲートが\n 閉じられちゃうわ！\n <cs_pchero>:
If we don't do something, they'll close the
transfer gate! Please stop them!

64526.「我ら あなうめ３兄弟に 仇なす者よ。\n なんじを 墓穴に 埋めてくれよう！！:
You who would cross us, the Hole-y
Three... We will dig your graves here!

64527.「……くッ ゴメンな アニキ。\n でも 最後くらい…… サボってた穴を\n 埋:
S-sorry, bro... but at least let me... go
out with a bang... blugh...

64528.「そうよ！ まだ あきらめちゃダメ……。\n アタシたちに…… 埋められない穴な:
That's right! We can't give up...
There is no hole... that we cannot fill!

64529.「よくぞ 言ったッ 我が弟妹よ……。\n 今こそ 我ら３兄弟の チカラを……\n:
Well said, my siblings. Now... it's time for
the three of us to unite our power...

64532.「クックックッ。ゼルドラドさまッ……\n 我ら あなうめ３兄弟……\n 仕事に:
Keh heh heh... Master Zeldrad... We, the
Hole-y Three... Leave no holes unfilled...
Guh....

64533.「カレヴァンさん 急ごっ！！\n 早く 行かないと 向こうに\n 帰れなくなっち:
Hurry, Kalevan! Now is our only chance to
go back home!

64537.「これでやっと カレヴァンさんは\n 家族に 会えるんだよね……。:
Now Kalevan can finally reunite with his
family...

64538.「ねぇ <cs_pchero>さん。\n 向こうの世界に戻ったら カレヴァンさん:
Can you do me a big favor? Once you go back to
the other world, can you... please give this
to him?

64540.「えへへっ。あれから 私ね……\n いろいろ勉強して 文字を読んだり\n 書いた:
Hehehe. Since we first met... I've learned
a lot of things, like reading and writing.

64541.「また <cs_pchero>さんに\n いろいろ 助けてもらっちゃったね。\n: You've done so much for me. Thank you so much!

64542.「じゃあ 私は もう行くね！\n バイバイ <cs_pchero>さん。:
Well, I'm gonna go now!
Bye bye, <cs_pchero>!

64543.「おおっ！ <pc>！\n ご苦労じゃったな。\n おぬしのことを 待ちかねてお:
Oh! <pc>, you've returned!
You've done quite well!

64544.「この姿で お会いするのは はじめてか……。\n 私が チョ…… いや カレヴァ:
This is the first time you've seen me like
this, huh? It's me, Cla... no, I mean...
Kalevan.

64545.「こちらのナシームの洞くつを 調べていたところ\n 左目に十字キズのある 魔物と:
I was investigating Naseem Cave when I came
across a monster with a scar over its eye!
That's when I had an idea!

64546.「案の定 その魔物は ワシの言うことを\n 聞いてくれてな。クドゥスの泉へ連れて:
Thankfully, the monster listened to me. I took
him to the Kudus Spring, and sure enough he
changed back to how he was before.

64547.「<pc>さん。\n あの後 アイツは……\n セラフィは どうしましたか？:
<pc>. After I left...
What did Seraphi do...?

64549.「<pc>さん。\n 黙ってちゃ わかりませんよ！\n いったい セラフィは ど:
I won't know unless you tell me.
Please, what did Seraphi do?!

64550.<pc>は カレヴァンに\nセラフィからの手紙を 渡した！:
<pc> gave Kalevan the letter
from Seraphi!

64553.「わたし こっちの あらはぎーろ\n まもるため のこります。:
"I weel stay heer and protect
Al-Ahigiro."

64554.「かればんさん いっしょに たびできて\n たのしかたよ！ きょうまで ありがと:
"It waz so fan to traval wit you, Mistur
Kalvan! Thank yoo so mach! Pleze take
cair of yur famly."

64556.「汚い字 書きやがって……。\n こんなんじゃ まともに読めやしない……。:
Your spelling and writing is so sloppy...
It's really hard to read...

64557.「アイツ 以前から言ってたんです。\n 魔物たちが人間になった 向こうの世界の\:
She's been saying that as long as I can
remember... To protect the other Al-Ahagiro,
where the monsters turned into humans...

64558.「きっと 自分が こちらに戻るつもりがないと\n 悟られたら 私も残るんじゃない:
But she knew that if I found out, I'd have
wanted to stay there, too. That's why she
acted that way... she did it for me...

64562.「ああ……。マレイカ\n 長い間 心配かけて すまなかった。:
Yeah... I'm sorry I made you worry for so
long.

64563.「家族って いいのう……。: A family sure is a great thing...

64564.「<pc>。あの家族が こうして\n ふたたび 一緒になれたのも\n おぬしのお:
<pc>. It is all thanks to you that
this family was reunited.

64565.「おぬしには これまで 幾度も世話になった。\n これが 今回の依頼の礼じゃ。\:
I can't count the number of times I've been
indebted to you for your help. Please accept
this as a token of my gratitude!

64566.「カレヴァン……。そなたは\n アラハギーロの者ではないのに 我が国の戦争に\n:
Kalevan... I know that you are not from
Al-Ahagiro. But you still were involved in
this country's war...

64567.「いえ……。私は 妻の故郷を守ろうと……\n そして 兄弟子の ベルムドの助けに:
Don't worry... I was only trying to protect
my wife's homeland and my partner, Bermud.

64568.「そのベルムドのことじゃが そなたは先ほど\n あれが 偽りのレンダーシアで\n:
As for that Bermud... you said that he died a
horrible death in the false Lendersia, did
you not...?

64569.「……カレヴァンよ。\n じつは そなたに 頼みがあるんじゃ。:
Actually, Kalevan... I have a favor to ask
of you.

64570.「そなたさえ よければ\n ベルムドの代わりに このアラハギーロの\n 格闘場の:
Would you be willing to take Bermud's place as
the keeper of our arena?

64572.「そうじゃ！ アラハギーロに留まり\n また この国を まもの使いの聖地として\:
Of course! I want you to stay here to help
make this country as vibrant as ever! A sacred
place for Monster Masters all over!

64574.「承知しました。しかし それは 魔物たちを\n キズつけあわせるためでは ありま:
I accept. However, the arena's purpose will
be for humans and monsters to coexist,
and not for monsters to hurt each other.

64575.「ねぇ パパ！\n パパとママと じぃじと ばぁばと\n ずっと ここに いられ:
Hey, Dad! Can I stay here with you and mom
and grandma and grandpa forever?! Can I?!

64578.「フフフ。この笑顔を たやさぬよう……\n 二度と あんなむごい戦争が起こらぬよ:
Hoho. I promise that I will do my best as
king to keep smiling, so that a terrible war
like this will never happen again.

64579.「この国は 長らく 先の見えない\n 闇夜の中を さまよっていたが……\n つい:
For so long this country has been shrouded in the darkness of night, with a future unclear... but at long last, the dawn of
Al-Ahagiro has come!

64580.「<pc>。おぬしも 疲れたじゃろう。\n ゆっくり 身体を休めたのち\n 改め:
You must be quite tired after your long
journey. Won't you visit us again after a
good, long rest?

64581.「……おぬしには\n 伝えておきたいことが あるんじゃ。: There is something I must tell you...

64582.「ふむ。来たか <pc>。\n じつは カレヴァンから 話を聞いて\n いろいろ:
Good to see you, <pc>.
I've learned some things from Kalevan
while you were away.

64583.「もう こちらの世界へ戻るためのゲートが\n ないこと……。そして あの戦争のさ:
He told me there is no longer a gate to this
world anymore... and the things that had
happened in the midst of that war.

64584.「おぬしが 特別な使命を持つ者であることは\n ワシも わかっておるつもりじゃ。:
I know that you have a very special mission.
That's why I thought it'd be wise to tell you
about it.

64585.「ことの発端は 大魔王の軍勢が砂漠の北東にある\n ピラミッドに攻め入ったことか:
It all started when the Demon Lord's army
invaded the Pyramid in the northeast desert.
We decided to go to war in order to defend it.

64586.「そんな中 当時 兵士長であったゴリウスが\n 圧倒的な大魔王の軍勢との 戦力差:
Gorius, the captain of the time, came up with
a plan to close the gap between his and the
Demon Lord's forces.

64587.「それは モンスター格闘場の管理人である\n ベルムドと 彼の魔物たちを\n 従:
His idea was to get Bermud, who managed the
Monster Arena, and his monsters, to follow
behind him...

64588.「往生際が 悪いぞ ベルムド！！\n この戦争に手を貸すと 約束したはずだ。\n:
You're completely out of line, Bermud! You
promised you would help in the war! Hurry up
and release those monsters!

64590.「我らに 協力できないと言うなら\n こやつらなど この場で\n 始末してやって:
If you don't cooperate, then I shall have them
killed where they stand. Got it?

64591.「いいか。この魔物たちは 我々の盾となるのだ。\n 魔物ごときが こんな名誉ある:
Now, listen up. These monsters will be our
shields. They should be grateful to be
given such a heroic duty!

64593.「ベルムドさん…… 私たちが 育てた魔物たちを\n 信じましょう。きっと 大魔王:
Bermud...we can trust in the monsters that
we've raised together. I have no doubt they'll
drive away the Demon Lord's army!

64595.「だが ゴリウスの企みで まもの使いの魔物は\n 戦争の最前線に立たされ 使いつ:
But because of Gorius' plan... those monsters
were forced to the front lines to act as
shields for the humans...

64596.「そして そこまでしても 我々は戦いに敗れ\n 敵に捕らわれた。そのとき 魔族の:
It didn't matter, because they were defeated
and captured anyway. Then, the leader of the
demons whispered something to Bermud...

64597.「愛する魔物たちの命を 軽んじる人間が\n 憎くないか？ ヤツらに 同じ恐怖と\:
"Don't you hate those humans who throw away
the monsters you love so dearly like garbage?
Don't you want them to feel the same agony?"

64598.「カレヴァンは そのとき ベルムドを\n 必死に止めたが 彼の怒りと悲しみは収ま:
Kalevan tried with all his might to stop
Bermud, but his anger and grief became too
strong and got the better of him.

64599.「そうして ベルムドは 魔族に心を売り\n 魔族の将から まがまがしいチカラを\:
And so... Bermud gave himself in to the
demons. The demon general gave him the power
to become a monster himself...

64600.「ベルムドは 偽りのアラハギーロ王国で\n 王位に就いて もともと人間だった者た:
Bermud was crowned king in the false
Al-Ahagiro, and tormented those who were
once human...

64601.「後のことは おぬしのほうが くわしいかの？\n これが この国に起こった 悲劇:
And I'm certain you already know what happened
next. This is the great tragedy that befell
this land.

64602.「まったく 魔族というものは おそろしい。\n 人の心の闇に つけいり もてあそ:
Demons are a truly horrifying... they
manipulate the darkness in people's hearts,
and live such a gruesome existence.

64603.「<pc>…… おぬしには\n 魔族と戦う使命が あるのじゃろう？\n くれぐれ:
You are on a mission to fight against the
demons, are you not? Please be sure to take
care of yourself.

64604.「この先 もし おぬしが困るようなことがあれば\n 今度は ワシが チカラになろ:
If you ever find yourself in trouble again, I
shall be there for you! Please feel free to
visit me any time you'd like.
